title.heading: WE MUST EACH RESPOND TO JESUS BY PLACING OUR TRUST IN HIM AS OUR SAVIOUR AND LORD. ONLY THEN CAN WE KNOW GOD PERSONALLY.

panel.text: with God that we are sinful and deciding to turn from our sin.
to forgive us completely because Jesus died for our sin.
to follow Jesus; putting him first in our lives.
But to all who believed him and accepted him, he gave the right to become children of God.
God saved you by his grace when you believed. And you can't take credit for this; it's a gift from God... so none of us can boast about it. - Ephesians 2:8-9
He saved us, not because of the righteous things we had done, but because of his mercy. He washed away our sins, giving us a new birth and new life. - Titus 3:5

page.question: It's not enough just to know or feel that this is true. We have a choice to make...
